{"id":873674113,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1673139968,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/873674113/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array","memory":"44.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) {\n        int currentElemtn = nums[0];\n        int pointer = 0;\n        if(nums.length == 1)\n        {\n            return 1;\n        }\n\n        for(int i =1;i<nums.length;i++)\n        {\n            while(i<nums.length && currentElemtn == nums[i] )\n            {\n                i++;\n            }\n            if(i<nums.length){\n            currentElemtn = nums[i];\n            nums[++pointer] = nums[i];\n            }\n        }\n\n        return pointer+1;\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-duplicates-from-sorted-array","has_notes":false}
